titleStmt.title: The historie of Frier Rush: how he came to a house of religion to seeke seruice, and being entertained by the priour, was first made vnder cooke. : Being full of pleasant mirth and delight for young people.
Friar Rush.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Edw. All-de, & are to be solde by Francis Groue dwelling on Snow hill.,

notesStmt.note: Illus. t.p., initial, head- and tail-piece; wood cut illustrations.
C₃r line two from bottom begins 'said, he'; D₄v line two from bottom has 'shooes and, I'.
Imperfect: stained, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
